name: clickn-circles
title: Clickn' Circles
description: A game made in pygame, and then again in Unity. A game to click circles. Don't press the red one, run the timed trials and see how many you can click in the time frame!

name: ash-aldeburgh
title: Ash Smoked Fishes Website
description: I made a site for my GrandFather using NextJS and Tailwind CSS. It's a site for a fish smoking company.

name: whitewater
title: Whitewater Website (Gaming Server)
description: A site I made for a gaming server that I'm the developer in, it is a site with links to a docs site I made and to other things like social links and a forums part of the site.

name: myhunter
title: My Hunter - Epitech
description: A first year project at Epitech Technology. The task was to recreate the game Duck Hunt using the CSFML library for C.

name: linktree
title: My Linktree
description: A site I made to share with people so they can see all of my most imortant links in one place..
